Package com.bumptech.glide.resize

Interface Summary
BitmapLoadTask An interface for loading a bitmap.
LoadedCallback An interface to handle loads completing successfully or failing
 

Class Summary
BaseBitmapLoadTask<T,Y> A base BitmapLoadTask that composes ResourceFetcher and BitmapDecoder to decode a bitmap from either an image or a video.
ImageManager A class to coordinate image loading, resizing, recycling, and caching.

RecyclableBufferedInputStream Wraps an existing InputStream and <em>buffers</em> the input.
